HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: doručení následující pracovní den (Při objednání v pracovních dnech do 10:00)

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Balíkovna: 59 Kč, GLS - výdejní místa: 59 Kč, PPL výdejní místa: 59 Kč, Zásilkovna: 64 Kč. Vše zdarma od 2 000 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: GLS - výdejní boxy: 59 Kč, PPL Alzaboxy: 59 Kč, PPL Parcelboxy: 59 Kč, Zásilkovna ZBox: 64 Kč. Vše zdarma od 2 000 Kč.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: Praha: 39 Kč, Chrudim: 15 Kč (ZDARMA od 2 000 Kč)

express_delivery.delivery_time: doručení ještě týž pracovní den (Praha: při objednání do 08:30, Chrudim: při objednání do 12:00)

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Sperky.cz offers a wide range of delivery methods in the Czech Republic, including home delivery, extensive parcel shop and parcel locker networks, and in-store pickup in Prague and Chrudim.
PROVIDERS: Carriers include Česká pošta (Balíkovna), PPL (Parcelshops, Parcelboxy, Alzaboxy), GLS (Parcel Shops, Parcel Boxes), and Zásilkovna (Pickup Points, Z-Boxes).
PRICING: Prices range from 15 Kč (in-store pickup in Chrudim) to 89 Kč (home delivery). Free shipping is available for all delivery methods on orders over 2 000 Kč. A packing fee of 25 Kč is charged for orders under 350 Kč.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The store offers very fast delivery, including next-day delivery for most options if ordered by the cut-off time, and same-day in-store pickup in Prague and Chrudim. Information about COD surcharges, weekend delivery, or bulky item shipping is not available.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented very clearly and is well-structured on a dedicated page. Each delivery option has its own section with details on pricing, delivery time, and order cut-off times, making it easy for customers to compare and choose.
